entries.text: Fixed a panic in the recovery path when marking PVC as resize in progress fails.
Fixed external-resizer crash when modifying volume with no previous volume attributes class.
Fixed a bug to prevent the VolumeResizeFailed event from being emitted during a resource conflict while setting FileSystemResizeRequired or VolumeResizeSuccess.

Added Modify Volume support for `VolumeAttributesClass`, requiring Kubernetes 1.29, with the `VolumeAttributesClass` feature gate and API enabled in both the Kubernetes cluster and the external resizer.
